name.ja: サラマングレイト・リヴァイブ

text.en: Target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Salamangreat" monster you control and 1 monster with the same name in your GY; shuffle that monster from the GY into the Deck, and if you do, that other monster you control gains ATK equal to its own original ATK until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Revive" once per turn.
